body:
Properties read from configuration and applied to specs may not be represented after af65146. This registers the special configuration types as represent-able in `syaml.dump`, thereby enabling core functions like `dag_hash` to proceed as normal for properties read from configuration.

At a lower level: syaml.dump now allows representing all syaml_ objects (in af65146 this was only available for syaml.dump_config).
title: Fix Spec.dag_hash for properties read from config
